content: this legal text summarizes a court case in savona involving two parties at and ct who were disputing the division of inherited properties in loano the court ruled that at must reimburse ct for expenses totaling 2582284 euros and pay a monthly amount of 25000 euros for the occupation of a rural dwelling house the properties were divided into two lots with at assigned one lot and ct assigned the other at was also ordered to pay ct 50000000 lire equivalent to 2582284 euros as compensation for care provided to their deceased sister and an additional 100000000 lire to the estate at was responsible for court costs and the parties were to share counsel fees equally the ruling also specified the value of the properties and the adjustment payments to be made the judgment is effective as of january 21 2006
